product_name: The North Face GTD Tights - Women's
long_description: Moisture-wicking tights for running in cool weather, The North Face GTD women's tights feature elastane for supportive stretch and mesh panels at the backs of the knees for maximum breathability. VaporWick(R) fabric is designed to wick moisture and dry quickly during those all-out sessions. Fabric protects skin from the sun with a UPF rating of 50+. Supportive fabric and back-of-the-knee mesh panels keep hard-working muscles comfortable when it's go time. Silver-salt treatment at gusset fights odors. Elastic waist with drawstring ensures a comfortable fit. A rear zippered pocket holds small items and keeps shifting to a minimum and features a glow-in-the-dark zipper pull. Calf zippers make dressing over shoes easy. The North Face GTD tights feature reflective highlights that increase visibility in low light.
short_description: Moisture-wicking tights for running in cool weather, The North Face GTD women's tights feature elastane for supportive stretch and mesh panels at the backs of the knees for maximum breathability.
